thread.title: Alec Baldwin gives kid pretty good lesson on his Trump impression
thread.title_full: Alec Baldwin gives kid pretty good lesson on his Trump impression

author: Christine Wang
title: Alec Baldwin gives kid pretty good lesson on his Trump impression
text:
Alec Baldwin rocked the world with his Donald Trump impression on Saturday Night Live . However, he recently said he most likely would not be doing the impression for much longer.
That doesn't mean that Baldwin won't pass the torch to someone else. In fact, Baldwin was spotted at the Boss Baby movie premiere teaching a kid the intricacies of a good Trump impression.
SEE ALSO: Alec Baldwin gives unsolicited love advice in the back of a taxi
. @AlecBaldwin teaches a young kid how to properly do a @realDonaldTrump impersonation #BossBaby premiere pic.twitter.com/v8On6ZMxYt
â€” Joanna Preston (@JoPrestonTV) March 20, 2017
While it's hard to hear exactly what Baldwin is saying, it's clear his rendition of Trump relies heavily on the position of the mouth. At one point, he tells his young apprentice, "Lower jaw. Lower jaw," while demonstrating the face for him.
Baldwin's coaching apparently yielded good results. Towards the end of the video, Baldwin watches the kid attempt the impression and claps, saying, "Got it. You got it."
We'll be looking for that kid on SNL .
